law.catch_line: Appropriation of funds for prosecution of violations of County ordinances.

text.section:
Sec. 2-19.1. Appropriation of funds for prosecution of violations of County ordinances.
The Board hereby appropriates the funding to pay the salary of one (1) Assistant State Attorney whose sole function shall be to prosecute violations of special laws or ordinances of the County. The County Manager is hereby directed to make the funds hereby appropriated available to the State Attorney of the Eleventh Judicial Circuit on a continuing basis.
